Detailed Description

Main engine class, that brings together all the components of OpenMW.

void OMW::Engine::activate (  ) 

Activate the focussed object.

void OMW::Engine::addMaster ( const std::string &  master  ) 

Set master file (esm)

  • If the given name does not have an extension, ".esm" is added automatically
  • Currently OpenMW only supports one master at the same time.
void OMW::Engine::addResourcesDirectory ( const boost::filesystem::path &  path  )  [private]

add resources directory

Note:
This function works recursively.

Enable debug mode:

  • non-exclusive input
void OMW::Engine::enableVerboseScripts (  ) 

Enable verbose script output.

Enable the command server so external apps can send commands to the console. Must be set before go().
